text: HOUSTON (Reuters) -PBF Energy shut the small reformer at its 190,000-barrel-per-day (bpd) Chalmette, Louisiana, refinery on Sunday following a fire, said sources familiar with plant operations.PBF did not immediately reply to a request for comment.The fire broke out on the 17,500-bpd reformer 1 on Saturday night, according to the sources. No injuries were reported.The pre-treater on the reformer was shut for a catalyst change.
